org.apache.cassandra.hadoop

Class AbstractColumnFamilyRecordWriter.AbstractRangeClient<K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.apache.cassandra.hadoop.AbstractColumnFamilyRecordWriter.AbstractRangeClient<K>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    AbstractColumnFamilyRecordWriter<K,Y>

    public abstract class AbstractColumnFamilyRecordWriter.AbstractRangeClient<K>
extends java.lang.Thread
    A client that runs in a threadpool and connects to the list of endpoints for a particular range. Mutations for keys in that range are sent to this client via a queue.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread
